question: How many points did each British driver score in total?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, SUM(results.points) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId WHERE drivers.nationality = 'British' GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE driver.nationality = 'British' RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, sum(result.points)

question: Which races were held at circuits in Italy after 2010?
sql: SELECT races.name, races.year, circuits.name FROM races JOIN circuits ON races.circuitId = circuits.circuitId WHERE circuits.country = 'Italy' AND races.year > 2010
cypher: MATCH (race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE circuit.country = 'Italy' AND toInteger(race.year) > 2010 RETURN race.name, race.year, circuit.name

question: How many race wins does each German driver have?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, COUNT(*) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId WHERE drivers.nationality = 'German' AND results.position = 1 GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE driver.nationality = 'German' AND result.position = 1 RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, count(*)

question: List all races and their circuits from the 2019 season ordered by round
sql: SELECT races.name, races.round, circuits.name, circuits.country FROM races JOIN circuits ON races.circuitId = circuits.circuitId WHERE races.year = 2019 ORDER BY races.round
cypher: MATCH (race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE race.year = '2019' RETURN race.name, race.round, circuit.name, circuit.country ORDER BY race.round

question: What is the average points scored per race by each constructor in 2020?
sql: SELECT constructors.name, AVG(constructor_results.points) FROM constructors JOIN constructor_results ON constructors.constructorId = constructor_results.constructorId JOIN races ON constructor_results.raceId = races.raceId WHERE races.year = 2020 GROUP BY constructors.constructorId, constructors.name
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors)-[:RESULTED_IN]->(cr:constructor_results), (race:races)-[:RESULTED_IN]->(cr) WHERE race.year = '2020' RETURN constructor.name, avg(cr.points)

question: Which drivers qualified in pole position at circuits in the UK?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT drivers.forename, drivers.surname FROM drivers JOIN qualifying ON drivers.driverId = qualifying.driverId JOIN races ON qualifying.raceId = races.raceId JOIN circuits ON races.circuitId = circuits.circuitId WHERE qualifying.position = 1 AND circuits.country = 'UK'
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:QUALIFIED_IN]->(q:qualifying)-[:FOR_RACE]->(race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE q.position = 1 AND circuit.country = 'UK' RETURN DISTINCT driver.forename, driver.surname

question: How many podium finishes does each Finnish driver have?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, COUNT(*) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId WHERE drivers.nationality = 'Finnish' AND results.position <= 3 GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE driver.nationality = 'Finnish' AND result.position <= 3 RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, count(*)

question: List races held at circuits with altitude above 500 meters in 2018
sql: SELECT races.name, circuits.name, circuits.alt FROM races JOIN circuits ON races.circuitId = circuits.circuitId WHERE circuits.alt > 500 AND races.year = 2018
cypher: MATCH (race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE circuit.alt > 500 AND race.year = '2018' RETURN race.name, circuit.name, circuit.alt

question: What is the total number of laps completed by each British constructor?
sql: SELECT constructors.name, SUM(results.laps) FROM constructors JOIN results ON constructors.constructorId = results.constructorId WHERE constructors.nationality = 'British' GROUP BY constructors.constructorId, constructors.name
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE constructor.nationality = 'British' RETURN constructor.name, sum(result.laps)

question: Which drivers started from grid position 1 and won the race in 2021?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT drivers.forename, drivers.surname FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId JOIN races ON results.raceId = races.raceId WHERE results.grid = 1 AND results.position = 1 AND races.year = 2021
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races) WHERE result.grid = 1 AND result.position = 1 AND race.year = '2021' RETURN DISTINCT driver.forename, driver.surname

question: How many races did each circuit host between 2015 and 2020?
sql: SELECT circuits.name, circuits.country, COUNT(*) FROM circuits JOIN races ON circuits.circuitId = races.circuitId WHERE races.year >= 2015 AND races.year <= 2020 GROUP BY circuits.circuitId, circuits.name, circuits.country
cypher: MATCH (race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE toInteger(race.year) >= 2015 AND toInteger(race.year) <= 2020 RETURN circuit.name, circuit.country, count(*)

question: List all Spanish drivers and their total career points
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, SUM(results.points) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId WHERE drivers.nationality = 'Spanish' GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE driver.nationality = 'Spanish' RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, sum(result.points)

question: Which constructors scored points in races held in Japan?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT constructors.name FROM constructors JOIN constructor_results ON constructors.constructorId = constructor_results.constructorId JOIN races ON constructor_results.raceId = races.raceId JOIN circuits ON races.circuitId = circuits.circuitId WHERE circuits.country = 'Japan' AND constructor_results.points > 0
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors)-[:RESULTED_IN]->(cr:constructor_results), (race:races)-[:RESULTED_IN]->(cr), (race)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE circuit.country = 'Japan' AND cr.points > 0 RETURN DISTINCT constructor.name

question: What is the maximum points scored in a single race by each driver in 2019?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, MAX(results.points) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId JOIN races ON results.raceId = races.raceId WHERE races.year = 2019 GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races) WHERE race.year = '2019' RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, max(result.points)

question: List the top 10 drivers by total points scored in 2020
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, SUM(results.points) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId JOIN races ON results.raceId = races.raceId WHERE races.year = 2020 GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname ORDER BY SUM(results.points) DESC LIMIT 10
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races) WHERE race.year = '2020' RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, sum(result.points) ORDER BY sum(result.points) DESC LIMIT 10

question: How many qualifying sessions did each Italian constructor participate in?
sql: SELECT constructors.name, COUNT(*) FROM constructors JOIN qualifying ON constructors.constructorId = qualifying.constructorId WHERE constructors.nationality = 'Italian' GROUP BY constructors.constructorId, constructors.name
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors)-[:QUALIFIED_IN]->(q:qualifying) WHERE constructor.nationality = 'Italian' RETURN constructor.name, count(*)

question: Which races in 2018 were held at circuits with latitude greater than 45?
sql: SELECT races.name, circuits.name, circuits.lat FROM races JOIN circuits ON races.circuitId = circuits.circuitId WHERE races.year = 2018 AND circuits.lat > 45
cypher: MATCH (race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE race.year = '2018' AND circuit.lat > 45 RETURN race.name, circuit.name, circuit.lat

question: What is the average grid position for each German driver?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, AVG(results.grid) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId WHERE drivers.nationality = 'German' GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE driver.nationality = 'German' RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, avg(result.grid)

question: List all drivers who finished on the podium at Monaco Grand Prix
sql: SELECT DISTINCT drivers.forename, drivers.surname FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId JOIN races ON results.raceId = races.raceId WHERE races.name LIKE '%Monaco%' AND results.position <= 3
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races) WHERE race.name CONTAINS 'Monaco' AND result.position <= 3 RETURN DISTINCT driver.forename, driver.surname

question: How many constructor championship wins does each team have?
sql: SELECT constructors.name, COUNT(*) FROM constructors JOIN constructor_standings ON constructors.constructorId = constructor_standings.constructorId WHERE constructor_standings.position = 1 GROUP BY constructors.constructorId, constructors.name
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors)-[:HAS_STANDING]->(cs:constructor_standings) WHERE cs.position = 1 RETURN constructor.name, count(*)

question: Which drivers scored more than 100 points in the 2019 season?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, SUM(results.points) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId JOIN races ON results.raceId = races.raceId WHERE races.year = 2019 GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname ORDER BY SUM(results.points) DESC
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races) WHERE race.year = '2019' RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, sum(result.points) ORDER BY sum(result.points) DESC

question: List all races and circuits from the 2017 season in Europe
sql: SELECT races.name, circuits.name, circuits.country FROM races JOIN circuits ON races.circuitId = circuits.circuitId WHERE races.year = 2017 AND circuits.country IN ('UK', 'Italy', 'Spain', 'Monaco', 'Belgium', 'Germany', 'Hungary', 'Austria')
cypher: MATCH (race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE race.year = '2017' AND circuit.country IN ['UK', 'Italy', 'Spain', 'Monaco', 'Belgium', 'Germany', 'Hungary', 'Austria'] RETURN race.name, circuit.name, circuit.country

question: What is the total number of race starts for each French driver?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, COUNT(*) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId WHERE drivers.nationality = 'French' GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE driver.nationality = 'French' RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, count(*)

question: Which constructors have won races at Silverstone?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT constructors.name FROM constructors JOIN results ON constructors.constructorId = results.constructorId JOIN races ON results.raceId = races.raceId JOIN circuits ON races.circuitId = circuits.circuitId WHERE circuits.name LIKE '%Silverstone%' AND results.position = 1
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE circuit.name CONTAINS 'Silverstone' AND result.position = 1 RETURN DISTINCT constructor.name

question: How many pole positions does each driver have in total?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, COUNT(*) FROM drivers JOIN qualifying ON drivers.driverId = qualifying.driverId WHERE qualifying.position = 1 GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:QUALIFIED_IN]->(q:qualifying) WHERE q.position = 1 RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, count(*) ORDER BY count(*) DESC

question: List all Brazilian drivers and their race wins
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, COUNT(*) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId WHERE drivers.nationality = 'Brazilian' AND results.position = 1 GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE driver.nationality = 'Brazilian' AND result.position = 1 RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, count(*)

question: What is the minimum lap time for each driver in 2020 races?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, MIN(results.milliseconds) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId JOIN races ON results.raceId = races.raceId WHERE races.year = 2020 AND results.milliseconds > 0 GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races) WHERE race.year = '2020' AND result.milliseconds <> '' RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, min(result.milliseconds)

question: Which circuits hosted races in both 2018 and 2019?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT circuits.name, circuits.country FROM circuits JOIN races ON circuits.circuitId = races.circuitId WHERE races.year = 2018 OR races.year = 2019
cypher: MATCH (race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE race.year = '2018' OR race.year = '2019' RETURN DISTINCT circuit.name, circuit.country

question: How many second-place finishes does each driver have?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, COUNT(*) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId WHERE results.position = 2 GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 15
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE result.position = 2 RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, count(*) ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 15

question: List races from 2021 at circuits below sea level
sql: SELECT races.name, circuits.name, circuits.alt FROM races JOIN circuits ON races.circuitId = circuits.circuitId WHERE races.year = 2021 AND circuits.alt < 0
cypher: MATCH (race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE race.year = '2021' AND circuit.alt < 0 RETURN race.name, circuit.name, circuit.alt

question: What is the average finishing position for each Japanese constructor?
sql: SELECT constructors.name, AVG(results.position) FROM constructors JOIN results ON constructors.constructorId = results.constructorId WHERE constructors.nationality = 'Japanese' AND results.position > 0 GROUP BY constructors.constructorId, constructors.name
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE constructor.nationality = 'Japanese' AND result.position > 0 RETURN constructor.name, avg(result.position)

question: Which drivers won races in their home country?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, circuits.country FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId JOIN races ON results.raceId = races.raceId JOIN circuits ON races.circuitId = circuits.circuitId WHERE results.position = 1 AND drivers.nationality = 'British' AND circuits.country = 'UK'
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE result.position = 1 AND driver.nationality = 'British' AND circuit.country = 'UK' RETURN DISTINCT driver.forename, driver.surname, circuit.country

question: How many fastest laps has each driver achieved?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, COUNT(*) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId WHERE results.rank = 1 GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 10
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE result.rank = 1 RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, count(*) ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 10

question: List all Australian drivers and their total races
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, COUNT(*) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId WHERE drivers.nationality = 'Australian' GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE driver.nationality = 'Australian' RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, count(*)

question: Which races had drivers start from grid position 20 or lower in 2020?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT races.name, races.round FROM races JOIN results ON races.raceId = results.raceId WHERE races.year = 2020 AND results.grid >= 20
cypher: MATCH (result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races) WHERE race.year = '2020' AND result.grid >= 20 RETURN DISTINCT race.name, race.round

question: What is the total points for each constructor in 2021?
sql: SELECT constructors.name, SUM(constructor_results.points) FROM constructors JOIN constructor_results ON constructors.constructorId = constructor_results.constructorId JOIN races ON constructor_results.raceId = races.raceId WHERE races.year = 2021 GROUP BY constructors.constructorId, constructors.name ORDER BY SUM(constructor_results.points) DESC
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors)-[:RESULTED_IN]->(cr:constructor_results), (race:races)-[:RESULTED_IN]->(cr) WHERE race.year = '2021' RETURN constructor.name, sum(cr.points) ORDER BY sum(cr.points) DESC

question: Which drivers finished ahead of their grid position most often in 2019?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, COUNT(*) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId JOIN races ON results.raceId = races.raceId WHERE races.year = 2019 AND results.position < results.grid AND results.position > 0 GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 10
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races) WHERE race.year = '2019' AND result.position < result.grid AND result.position > 0 RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, count(*) ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 10

question: List all Dutch drivers and their podium finishes
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, COUNT(*) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId WHERE drivers.nationality = 'Dutch' AND results.position <= 3 GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE driver.nationality = 'Dutch' AND result.position <= 3 RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, count(*)

question: How many races did each circuit in Asia host?
sql: SELECT circuits.name, circuits.country, COUNT(*) FROM circuits JOIN races ON circuits.circuitId = races.circuitId WHERE circuits.country IN ('Japan', 'China', 'Malaysia', 'Singapore', 'Bahrain', 'UAE') GROUP BY circuits.circuitId, circuits.name, circuits.country
cypher: MATCH (race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE circuit.country IN ['Japan', 'China', 'Malaysia', 'Singapore', 'Bahrain', 'UAE'] RETURN circuit.name, circuit.country, count(*)

question: What is the average points per race for each Mercedes driver?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, AVG(results.points) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId JOIN constructors ON results.constructorId = constructors.constructorId WHERE constructors.name LIKE '%Mercedes%' GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)<-[:ACHIEVED]-(constructor:constructors) WHERE constructor.name CONTAINS 'Mercedes' RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, avg(result.points)

question: Which constructors had drivers qualify in top 3 in 2020?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT constructors.name FROM constructors JOIN qualifying ON constructors.constructorId = qualifying.constructorId JOIN races ON qualifying.raceId = races.raceId WHERE qualifying.position <= 3 AND races.year = 2020
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors)-[:QUALIFIED_IN]->(q:qualifying)-[:FOR_RACE]->(race:races) WHERE q.position <= 3 AND race.year = '2020' RETURN DISTINCT constructor.name

question: How many races has each Mexican driver competed in?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, COUNT(*) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId WHERE drivers.nationality = 'Mexican' GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE driver.nationality = 'Mexican' RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, count(*)

question: List races where drivers completed more than 60 laps in 2021
sql: SELECT DISTINCT races.name, races.round FROM races JOIN results ON races.raceId = results.raceId WHERE races.year = 2021 AND results.laps > 60
cypher: MATCH (result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races) WHERE race.year = '2021' AND result.laps > 60 RETURN DISTINCT race.name, race.round

question: What is the total number of wins for each Austrian constructor?
sql: SELECT constructors.name, COUNT(*) FROM constructors JOIN results ON constructors.constructorId = results.constructorId WHERE constructors.nationality = 'Austrian' AND results.position = 1 GROUP BY constructors.constructorId, constructors.name
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE constructor.nationality = 'Austrian' AND result.position = 1 RETURN constructor.name, count(*)

question: Which drivers had their best qualifying position at Monza?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, MIN(qualifying.position) FROM drivers JOIN qualifying ON drivers.driverId = qualifying.driverId JOIN races ON qualifying.raceId = races.raceId JOIN circuits ON races.circuitId = circuits.circuitId WHERE circuits.name LIKE '%Monza%' GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname ORDER BY MIN(qualifying.position) LIMIT 10
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:QUALIFIED_IN]->(q:qualifying)-[:FOR_RACE]->(race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE circuit.name CONTAINS 'Monza' RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, min(q.position) ORDER BY min(q.position) LIMIT 10

question: How many points did each constructor score in the 2018 season?
sql: SELECT constructors.name, SUM(constructor_results.points) FROM constructors JOIN constructor_results ON constructors.constructorId = constructor_results.constructorId JOIN races ON constructor_results.raceId = races.raceId WHERE races.year = 2018 GROUP BY constructors.constructorId, constructors.name ORDER BY SUM(constructor_results.points) DESC
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors)-[:RESULTED_IN]->(cr:constructor_results), (race:races)-[:RESULTED_IN]->(cr) WHERE race.year = '2018' RETURN constructor.name, sum(cr.points) ORDER BY sum(cr.points) DESC

question: List all Canadian drivers with their total career wins
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, COUNT(*) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId WHERE drivers.nationality = 'Canadian' AND results.position = 1 GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE driver.nationality = 'Canadian' AND result.position = 1 RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, count(*)

question: Which circuits have hosted more than 30 races?
sql: SELECT circuits.name, circuits.country, COUNT(*) FROM circuits JOIN races ON circuits.circuitId = races.circuitId GROUP BY circuits.circuitId, circuits.name, circuits.country ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
cypher: MATCH (race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) RETURN circuit.name, circuit.country, count(*) ORDER BY count(*) DESC

question: What is the average number of laps completed per race by British drivers?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, AVG(results.laps) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId WHERE drivers.nationality = 'British' GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE driver.nationality = 'British' RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, avg(result.laps)

question: Which drivers scored points in races at Spa-Francorchamps?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT drivers.forename, drivers.surname FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId JOIN races ON results.raceId = races.raceId JOIN circuits ON races.circuitId = circuits.circuitId WHERE circuits.name LIKE '%Spa%' AND results.points > 0
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE circuit.name CONTAINS 'Spa' AND result.points > 0 RETURN DISTINCT driver.forename, driver.surname

question: How many retirements did each constructor have in 2019?
sql: SELECT constructors.name, COUNT(*) FROM constructors JOIN results ON constructors.constructorId = results.constructorId JOIN races ON results.raceId = races.raceId WHERE races.year = 2019 AND results.position = 0 GROUP BY constructors.constructorId, constructors.name
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races) WHERE race.year = '2019' AND result.position = 0 RETURN constructor.name, count(*)

question: List races from 2020 held at circuits in the Americas
sql: SELECT races.name, circuits.name, circuits.country FROM races JOIN circuits ON races.circuitId = circuits.circuitId WHERE races.year = 2020 AND circuits.country IN ('USA', 'Brazil', 'Mexico', 'Canada')
cypher: MATCH (race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE race.year = '2020' AND circuit.country IN ['USA', 'Brazil', 'Mexico', 'Canada'] RETURN race.name, circuit.name, circuit.country

question: What is the total number of third-place finishes for each driver?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, COUNT(*) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId WHERE results.position = 3 GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 15
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE result.position = 3 RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, count(*) ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 15

question: Which Italian constructors have won races?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT constructors.name FROM constructors JOIN results ON constructors.constructorId = results.constructorId WHERE constructors.nationality = 'Italian' AND results.position = 1
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE constructor.nationality = 'Italian' AND result.position = 1 RETURN DISTINCT constructor.name

question: How many races did each driver complete without scoring points in 2021?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, COUNT(*) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId JOIN races ON results.raceId = races.raceId WHERE races.year = 2021 AND results.points = 0 GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races) WHERE race.year = '2021' AND result.points = 0 RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, count(*)

question: List all races held at circuits with longitude between -10 and 30
sql: SELECT races.name, races.year, circuits.name FROM races JOIN circuits ON races.circuitId = circuits.circuitId WHERE circuits.lng >= -10 AND circuits.lng <= 30
cypher: MATCH (race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE circuit.lng >= -10 AND circuit.lng <= 30 RETURN race.name, race.year, circuit.name

question: What is the maximum number of wins in a season for each driver?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, MAX(standings.wins) FROM drivers JOIN standings ON drivers.driverId = standings.driverId GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname ORDER BY MAX(standings.wins) DESC LIMIT 10
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED_STANDING]->(standing:standings) RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, max(standing.wins) ORDER BY max(standing.wins) DESC LIMIT 10

question: Which drivers have competed for both Ferrari and McLaren?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT drivers.forename, drivers.surname FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId JOIN constructors ON results.constructorId = constructors.constructorId WHERE constructors.name = 'Ferrari' OR constructors.name = 'McLaren'
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)<-[:ACHIEVED]-(constructor:constructors) WHERE constructor.name = 'Ferrari' OR constructor.name = 'McLaren' RETURN DISTINCT driver.forename, driver.surname

question: How many poles has each constructor achieved in 2020?
sql: SELECT constructors.name, COUNT(*) FROM constructors JOIN qualifying ON constructors.constructorId = qualifying.constructorId JOIN races ON qualifying.raceId = races.raceId WHERE qualifying.position = 1 AND races.year = 2020 GROUP BY constructors.constructorId, constructors.name
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors)-[:QUALIFIED_IN]->(q:qualifying)-[:FOR_RACE]->(race:races) WHERE q.position = 1 AND race.year = '2020' RETURN constructor.name, count(*)

question: List the top 5 circuits by total races hosted
sql: SELECT circuits.name, circuits.country, COUNT(*) FROM circuits JOIN races ON circuits.circuitId = races.circuitId GROUP BY circuits.circuitId, circuits.name, circuits.country ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 5
cypher: MATCH (race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) RETURN circuit.name, circuit.country, count(*) ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 5

question: What is the total points scored by each Belgian driver?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, SUM(results.points) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId WHERE drivers.nationality = 'Belgian' GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE driver.nationality = 'Belgian' RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, sum(result.points)

question: Which constructors scored more than 200 points in 2019?
sql: SELECT constructors.name, SUM(constructor_results.points) FROM constructors JOIN constructor_results ON constructors.constructorId = constructor_results.constructorId JOIN races ON constructor_results.raceId = races.raceId WHERE races.year = 2019 GROUP BY constructors.constructorId, constructors.name ORDER BY SUM(constructor_results.points) DESC
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors)-[:RESULTED_IN]->(cr:constructor_results), (race:races)-[:RESULTED_IN]->(cr) WHERE race.year = '2019' RETURN constructor.name, sum(cr.points) ORDER BY sum(cr.points) DESC

question: How many front row starts does each driver have?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, COUNT(*) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId WHERE results.grid <= 2 GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 15
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE result.grid <= 2 RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, count(*) ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 15

question: List all races from 2022 at circuits in the Middle East
sql: SELECT races.name, circuits.name, circuits.country FROM races JOIN circuits ON races.circuitId = circuits.circuitId WHERE races.year = 2022 AND circuits.country IN ('Bahrain', 'UAE', 'Saudi Arabia', 'Qatar')
cypher: MATCH (race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE race.year = '2022' AND circuit.country IN ['Bahrain', 'UAE', 'Saudi Arabia', 'Qatar'] RETURN race.name, circuit.name, circuit.country

question: What is the average finishing position for each Swiss constructor?
sql: SELECT constructors.name, AVG(results.position) FROM constructors JOIN results ON constructors.constructorId = results.constructorId WHERE constructors.nationality = 'Swiss' AND results.position > 0 GROUP BY constructors.constructorId, constructors.name
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE constructor.nationality = 'Swiss' AND result.position > 0 RETURN constructor.name, avg(result.position)

question: Which drivers started last and finished in the points?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT drivers.forename, drivers.surname FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId WHERE results.grid >= 20 AND results.points > 0
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE result.grid >= 20 AND result.points > 0 RETURN DISTINCT driver.forename, driver.surname

question: How many races were held at each circuit in 2021?
sql: SELECT circuits.name, COUNT(*) FROM circuits JOIN races ON circuits.circuitId = races.circuitId WHERE races.year = 2021 GROUP BY circuits.circuitId, circuits.name
cypher: MATCH (race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE race.year = '2021' RETURN circuit.name, count(*)

question: What is the total number of laps led by each driver in 2020?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, SUM(results.laps) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId JOIN races ON results.raceId = races.raceId WHERE races.year = 2020 AND results.position = 1 GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races) WHERE race.year = '2020' AND result.position = 1 RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, sum(result.laps)

question: Which drivers competed in races at circuits in Germany?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT drivers.forename, drivers.surname FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId JOIN races ON results.raceId = races.raceId JOIN circuits ON races.circuitId = circuits.circuitId WHERE circuits.country = 'Germany'
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE circuit.country = 'Germany' RETURN DISTINCT driver.forename, driver.surname

question: How many qualifying top 10 positions does each driver have?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, COUNT(*) FROM drivers JOIN qualifying ON drivers.driverId = qualifying.driverId WHERE qualifying.position <= 10 GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 20
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:QUALIFIED_IN]->(q:qualifying) WHERE q.position <= 10 RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, count(*) ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 20

question: List the total wins for each constructor in 2021
sql: SELECT constructors.name, COUNT(*) FROM constructors JOIN results ON constructors.constructorId = results.constructorId JOIN races ON results.raceId = races.raceId WHERE results.position = 1 AND races.year = 2021 GROUP BY constructors.constructorId, constructors.name
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races) WHERE result.position = 1 AND race.year = '2021' RETURN constructor.name, count(*)

question: What is the average grid position for races at Monaco?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, AVG(results.grid) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId JOIN races ON results.raceId = races.raceId WHERE races.name LIKE '%Monaco%' GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname ORDER BY AVG(results.grid) LIMIT 10
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races) WHERE race.name CONTAINS 'Monaco' RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, avg(result.grid) ORDER BY avg(result.grid) LIMIT 10

question: Which Danish drivers have scored podium finishes?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT drivers.forename, drivers.surname FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId WHERE drivers.nationality = 'Danish' AND results.position <= 3
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE driver.nationality = 'Danish' AND result.position <= 3 RETURN DISTINCT driver.forename, driver.surname

question: How many races were held at circuits above 2000 meters altitude?
sql: SELECT circuits.name, COUNT(*) FROM circuits JOIN races ON circuits.circuitId = races.circuitId WHERE circuits.alt > 2000 GROUP BY circuits.circuitId, circuits.name
cypher: MATCH (race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE circuit.alt > 2000 RETURN circuit.name, count(*)

question: What is the total points for each driver in the 2017 season?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, SUM(results.points) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId JOIN races ON results.raceId = races.raceId WHERE races.year = 2017 GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname ORDER BY SUM(results.points) DESC
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races) WHERE race.year = '2017' RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, sum(result.points) ORDER BY sum(result.points) DESC

question: Which constructors have had drivers finish on the podium in 2022?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT constructors.name FROM constructors JOIN results ON constructors.constructorId = results.constructorId JOIN races ON results.raceId = races.raceId WHERE results.position <= 3 AND races.year = 2022
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races) WHERE result.position <= 3 AND race.year = '2022' RETURN DISTINCT constructor.name

question: How many races has each circuit in Europe hosted since 2010?
sql: SELECT circuits.name, circuits.country, COUNT(*) FROM circuits JOIN races ON circuits.circuitId = races.circuitId WHERE circuits.country IN ('UK', 'Italy', 'Spain', 'Monaco', 'Belgium', 'Germany', 'Hungary', 'Austria', 'France', 'Netherlands', 'Portugal') AND races.year >= 2010 GROUP BY circuits.circuitId, circuits.name, circuits.country
cypher: MATCH (race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE circuit.country IN ['UK', 'Italy', 'Spain', 'Monaco', 'Belgium', 'Germany', 'Hungary', 'Austria', 'France', 'Netherlands', 'Portugal'] AND toInteger(race.year) >= 2010 RETURN circuit.name, circuit.country, count(*)

question: List drivers who have never won a race but scored podiums
sql: SELECT DISTINCT drivers.forename, drivers.surname FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId WHERE results.position = 2 OR results.position = 3
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE result.position = 2 OR result.position = 3 RETURN DISTINCT driver.forename, driver.surname

question: What is the minimum grid position each driver started from in 2018?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, MIN(results.grid) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId JOIN races ON results.raceId = races.raceId WHERE races.year = 2018 AND results.grid > 0 GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races) WHERE race.year = '2018' AND result.grid > 0 RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, min(result.grid)

question: Which races were won by drivers starting from grid position 3 or lower?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT races.name, races.year FROM races JOIN results ON races.raceId = results.raceId WHERE results.grid >= 3 AND results.position = 1
cypher: MATCH (result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races) WHERE result.grid >= 3 AND result.position = 1 RETURN DISTINCT race.name, race.year

question: How many points did constructors score in round 1 races?
sql: SELECT constructors.name, SUM(constructor_results.points) FROM constructors JOIN constructor_results ON constructors.constructorId = constructor_results.constructorId JOIN races ON constructor_results.raceId = races.raceId WHERE races.round = 1 GROUP BY constructors.constructorId, constructors.name ORDER BY SUM(constructor_results.points) DESC
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors)-[:RESULTED_IN]->(cr:constructor_results), (race:races)-[:RESULTED_IN]->(cr) WHERE race.round = '1' RETURN constructor.name, sum(cr.points) ORDER BY sum(cr.points) DESC

question: List all drivers who competed in races at circuits in Australia
sql: SELECT DISTINCT drivers.forename, drivers.surname FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId JOIN races ON results.raceId = races.raceId JOIN circuits ON races.circuitId = circuits.circuitId WHERE circuits.country = 'Australia'
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE circuit.country = 'Australia' RETURN DISTINCT driver.forename, driver.surname

question: What is the average points per race for each German constructor?
sql: SELECT constructors.name, AVG(constructor_results.points) FROM constructors JOIN constructor_results ON constructors.constructorId = constructor_results.constructorId WHERE constructors.nationality = 'German' GROUP BY constructors.constructorId, constructors.name
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors)-[:RESULTED_IN]->(cr:constructor_results) WHERE constructor.nationality = 'German' RETURN constructor.name, avg(cr.points)

question: Which circuits hosted races in consecutive years from 2019 to 2021?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT circuits.name, circuits.country FROM circuits JOIN races ON circuits.circuitId = races.circuitId WHERE races.year >= 2019 AND races.year <= 2021
cypher: MATCH (race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE toInteger(race.year) >= 2019 AND toInteger(race.year) <= 2021 RETURN DISTINCT circuit.name, circuit.country

question: How many top 5 finishes does each Russian driver have?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, COUNT(*) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId WHERE drivers.nationality = 'Russian' AND results.position <= 5 GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE driver.nationality = 'Russian' AND result.position <= 5 RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, count(*)

question: List races from 2016 where any driver scored 25 points
sql: SELECT DISTINCT races.name, races.round FROM races JOIN results ON races.raceId = results.raceId WHERE races.year = 2016 AND results.points = 25
cypher: MATCH (result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races) WHERE race.year = '2016' AND result.points = 25 RETURN DISTINCT race.name, race.round

cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE result.position = 1 RETURN constructor.name, count(*) ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 15

question: Which drivers have qualified in the top 5 at circuits in Belgium?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT drivers.forename, drivers.surname FROM drivers JOIN qualifying ON drivers.driverId = qualifying.driverId JOIN races ON qualifying.raceId = races.raceId JOIN circuits ON races.circuitId = circuits.circuitId WHERE qualifying.position <= 5 AND circuits.country = 'Belgium'
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:QUALIFIED_IN]->(q:qualifying)-[:FOR_RACE]->(race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE q.position <= 5 AND circuit.country = 'Belgium' RETURN DISTINCT driver.forename, driver.surname

question: How many retirements has each Finnish driver had?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, COUNT(*) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId WHERE drivers.nationality = 'Finnish' AND results.position = 0 GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE driver.nationality = 'Finnish' AND result.position = 0 RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, count(*)

question: List all races held in Europe in 2015
sql: SELECT races.name, circuits.name, circuits.country FROM races JOIN circuits ON races.circuitId = circuits.circuitId WHERE races.year = 2015 AND circuits.country IN ('UK', 'Italy', 'Spain', 'Monaco', 'Belgium', 'Germany', 'Hungary', 'Austria')
cypher: MATCH (race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE race.year = '2015' AND circuit.country IN ['UK', 'Italy', 'Spain', 'Monaco', 'Belgium', 'Germany', 'Hungary', 'Austria'] RETURN race.name, circuit.name, circuit.country

question: What is the maximum points scored by each constructor in a single race?
sql: SELECT constructors.name, MAX(constructor_results.points) FROM constructors JOIN constructor_results ON constructors.constructorId = constructor_results.constructorId GROUP BY constructors.constructorId, constructors.name ORDER BY MAX(constructor_results.points) DESC LIMIT 10
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors)-[:RESULTED_IN]->(cr:constructor_results) RETURN constructor.name, max(cr.points) ORDER BY max(cr.points) DESC LIMIT 10

question: Which drivers scored points in their first race in 2020?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT drivers.forename, drivers.surname FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId JOIN races ON results.raceId = races.raceId WHERE races.year = 2020 AND races.round = 1 AND results.points > 0
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races) WHERE race.year = '2020' AND race.round = '1' AND result.points > 0 RETURN DISTINCT driver.forename, driver.surname

question: How many championship points did each South African driver score?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, SUM(results.points) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId WHERE drivers.nationality = 'South African' GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE driver.nationality = 'South African' RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, sum(result.points)

question: List races where the pole sitter won the race in 2021
sql: SELECT DISTINCT races.name, races.round FROM races JOIN results ON races.raceId = results.raceId WHERE races.year = 2021 AND results.grid = 1 AND results.position = 1
cypher: MATCH (result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races) WHERE race.year = '2021' AND result.grid = 1 AND result.position = 1 RETURN DISTINCT race.name, race.round

question: What is the average number of laps completed at each circuit?
sql: SELECT circuits.name, AVG(results.laps) FROM circuits JOIN races ON circuits.circuitId = races.circuitId JOIN results ON races.raceId = results.raceId GROUP BY circuits.circuitId, circuits.name
cypher: MATCH (result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) RETURN circuit.name, avg(result.laps)

question: Which constructors had both drivers finish in the top 10 in any race?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT constructors.name FROM constructors JOIN results ON constructors.constructorId = results.constructorId WHERE results.position <= 10 AND results.position > 0
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE result.position <= 10 AND result.position > 0 RETURN DISTINCT constructor.name

question: How many victories does each circuit have recorded?
sql: SELECT circuits.name, COUNT(*) FROM circuits JOIN races ON circuits.circuitId = races.circuitId JOIN results ON races.raceId = results.raceId WHERE results.position = 1 GROUP BY circuits.circuitId, circuits.name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
cypher: MATCH (result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE result.position = 1 RETURN circuit.name, count(*) ORDER BY count(*) DESC

question: List drivers who have won at Silverstone
sql: SELECT DISTINCT drivers.forename, drivers.surname FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId JOIN races ON results.raceId = races.raceId JOIN circuits ON races.circuitId = circuits.circuitId WHERE circuits.name LIKE '%Silverstone%' AND results.position = 1
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE circuit.name CONTAINS 'Silverstone' AND result.position = 1 RETURN DISTINCT driver.forename, driver.surname

question: What is the total number of races each constructor participated in?
sql: SELECT constructors.name, COUNT(*) FROM constructors JOIN results ON constructors.constructorId = results.constructorId GROUP BY constructors.constructorId, constructors.name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 20
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) RETURN constructor.name, count(*) ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 20

question: Which drivers scored points at Monaco Grand Prix in 2019?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, results.points FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId JOIN races ON results.raceId = races.raceId WHERE races.name LIKE '%Monaco%' AND races.year = 2019 AND results.points > 0
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races) WHERE race.name CONTAINS 'Monaco' AND race.year = '2019' AND result.points > 0 RETURN DISTINCT driver.forename, driver.surname, result.points

question: How many podiums has each Italian constructor achieved?
sql: SELECT constructors.name, COUNT(*) FROM constructors JOIN results ON constructors.constructorId = results.constructorId WHERE constructors.nationality = 'Italian' AND results.position <= 3 GROUP BY constructors.constructorId, constructors.name
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE constructor.nationality = 'Italian' AND result.position <= 3 RETURN constructor.name, count(*)

question: List all races from circuits located at sea level
sql: SELECT races.name, races.year, circuits.name FROM races JOIN circuits ON races.circuitId = circuits.circuitId WHERE circuits.alt = 0 ORDER BY races.year DESC LIMIT 20
cypher: MATCH (race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE circuit.alt = 0 RETURN race.name, race.year, circuit.name ORDER BY race.year DESC LIMIT 20

question: What is the average qualifying position for each Argentine driver?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, AVG(qualifying.position) FROM drivers JOIN qualifying ON drivers.driverId = qualifying.driverId WHERE drivers.nationality = 'Argentine' GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:QUALIFIED_IN]->(q:qualifying) WHERE driver.nationality = 'Argentine' RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, avg(q.position)

question: Which races in 2020 had more than 15 classified finishers?
sql: SELECT races.name, COUNT(*) FROM races JOIN results ON races.raceId = results.raceId WHERE races.year = 2020 AND results.position > 0 GROUP BY races.raceId, races.name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
cypher: MATCH (result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races) WHERE race.year = '2020' AND result.position > 0 RETURN race.name, count(*) ORDER BY count(*) DESC

question: How many front row lockouts has each constructor achieved?
sql: SELECT constructors.name, COUNT(*) FROM constructors JOIN qualifying ON constructors.constructorId = qualifying.constructorId WHERE qualifying.position <= 2 GROUP BY constructors.constructorId, constructors.name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 10
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors)-[:QUALIFIED_IN]->(q:qualifying) WHERE q.position <= 2 RETURN constructor.name, count(*) ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 10

question: List drivers who completed all laps in races at circuits with more than 100 laps
sql: SELECT DISTINCT drivers.forename, drivers.surname FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId WHERE results.laps > 100
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE result.laps > 100 RETURN DISTINCT driver.forename, driver.surname

question: What is the total points for constructors in races held at street circuits?
sql: SELECT constructors.name, SUM(constructor_results.points) FROM constructors JOIN constructor_results ON constructors.constructorId = constructor_results.constructorId JOIN races ON constructor_results.raceId = races.raceId JOIN circuits ON races.circuitId = circuits.circuitId WHERE circuits.name LIKE '%Street%' OR circuits.name LIKE '%Monaco%' GROUP BY constructors.constructorId, constructors.name
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors)-[:RESULTED_IN]->(cr:constructor_results), (race:races)-[:RESULTED_IN]->(cr), (race)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE circuit.name CONTAINS 'Street' OR circuit.name CONTAINS 'Monaco' RETURN constructor.name, sum(cr.points)

question: Which drivers have achieved the fastest lap in races at Monza?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT drivers.forename, drivers.surname FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId JOIN races ON results.raceId = races.raceId JOIN circuits ON races.circuitId = circuits.circuitId WHERE circuits.name LIKE '%Monza%' AND results.rank = 1
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE circuit.name CONTAINS 'Monza' AND result.rank = 1 RETURN DISTINCT driver.forename, driver.surname

question: How many races did each driver finish outside the points in 2018?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, COUNT(*) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId JOIN races ON results.raceId = races.raceId WHERE races.year = 2018 AND results.points = 0 AND results.position > 0 GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races) WHERE race.year = '2018' AND result.points = 0 AND result.position > 0 RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, count(*)

question: List all races where British drivers finished on the podium
sql: SELECT DISTINCT races.name, races.year FROM races JOIN results ON races.raceId = results.raceId JOIN drivers ON results.driverId = drivers.driverId WHERE drivers.nationality = 'British' AND results.position <= 3
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races) WHERE driver.nationality = 'British' AND result.position <= 3 RETURN DISTINCT race.name, race.year

question: What is the average race duration for each circuit?
sql: SELECT circuits.name, AVG(results.milliseconds) FROM circuits JOIN races ON circuits.circuitId = races.circuitId JOIN results ON races.raceId = results.raceId WHERE results.milliseconds > 0 GROUP BY circuits.circuitId, circuits.name
cypher: MATCH (result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE result.milliseconds <> '' RETURN circuit.name, avg(toFloat(result.milliseconds))

question: Which constructors have won at least one race in 2019?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT constructors.name FROM constructors JOIN results ON constructors.constructorId = results.constructorId JOIN races ON results.raceId = races.raceId WHERE results.position = 1 AND races.year = 2019
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(race:races) WHERE result.position = 1 AND race.year = '2019' RETURN DISTINCT constructor.name

question: How many drivers from each nationality have competed?
sql: SELECT drivers.nationality, COUNT(*) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId GROUP BY drivers.nationality ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) RETURN driver.nationality, count(*) ORDER BY count(*) DESC

question: List races at circuits with altitude between 200 and 800 meters
sql: SELECT races.name, circuits.name, circuits.alt FROM races JOIN circuits ON races.circuitId = circuits.circuitId WHERE circuits.alt >= 200 AND circuits.alt <= 800
cypher: MATCH (race:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(circuit:circuits) WHERE circuit.alt >= 200 AND circuit.alt <= 800 RETURN race.name, circuit.name, circuit.alt

question: What is the total number of points for each driver who raced for Red Bull?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, SUM(results.points) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId JOIN constructors ON results.constructorId = constructors.constructorId WHERE constructors.name LIKE '%Red Bull%' GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results)<-[:ACHIEVED]-(constructor:constructors) WHERE constructor.name CONTAINS 'Red Bull' RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, sum(result.points)

question: Which races had Finnish drivers on pole position?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT races.name, races.year FROM races JOIN qualifying ON races.raceId = qualifying.raceId JOIN drivers ON qualifying.driverId = drivers.driverId WHERE drivers.nationality = 'Finnish' AND qualifying.position = 1
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:QUALIFIED_IN]->(q:qualifying)-[:FOR_RACE]->(race:races) WHERE driver.nationality = 'Finnish' AND q.position = 1 RETURN DISTINCT race.name, race.year

question: How many races has each Austrian constructor participated in?
sql: SELECT constructors.name, COUNT(*) FROM constructors JOIN results ON constructors.constructorId = results.constructorId WHERE constructors.nationality = 'Austrian' GROUP BY constructors.constructorId, constructors.name
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) WHERE constructor.nationality = 'Austrian' RETURN constructor.name, count(*)

question: List the top 10 drivers by total career points
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, SUM(results.points) FROM drivers JOIN results ON drivers.driverId = results.driverId GROUP BY drivers.driverId, drivers.forename, drivers.surname ORDER BY SUM(results.points) DESC LIMIT 10
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers)-[:ACHIEVED]->(result:results) RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, sum(result.points) ORDER BY sum(result.points) DESC LIMIT 10
